content: I was wrong. I'm sorry I didn't listen.
I messed up. No excuses. I'm sorry.
I should've handled that differently. I'm sorry.
You deserved better from me. I'm sorry.
I let you down. I know that. I'm working on it.
I'm sorry I wasn't there when you needed me.
That was on me. I'm sorry.
I shouldn't have said that. I'm sorry.
I know I hurt you. I'm sorry. Really.
You were right. I was wrong. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I put work before you.
I should've listened instead of talking. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry for taking you for granted.
I didn't show up the way I should have. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I forgot. It mattered. I know.
I was selfish. I see that now. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I made you feel that way.
That was unfair of me. I'm sorry.
I should've been more patient. I'm sorry.
I know I've been distant. I'm sorry. I'm here now.
I'm sorry I didn't see what you were going through.
I reacted badly. That's on me. I'm sorry.
I should've had your back. I'm sorry I didn't.
I'm sorry for the stress I've caused you.
I know I've been hard to live with. I'm sorry.
I shouldn't have dismissed how you felt. I'm sorry.
I let my frustration out on you. That wasn't fair.
I'm sorry I wasn't the partner you needed.
I should've tried harder. I'm sorry.
You were clear about what you needed. I didn't deliver. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I didn't prioritize us.
I could've done better. I will do better.
I'm sorry I wasn't paying attention.
I know I dropped the ball. I'm sorry.
I should've thought about how that affected you.
I'm sorry for being defensive instead of listening.
That wasn't the husband you deserve. I'm sorry.
I'm working on being better. I'm sorry for the setbacks.
I know sorry isn't enough. But I mean it.
I'm sorry. I want to make it right.
I wasn't fair to you. I'm sorry.
I should've noticed. I'm sorry I didn't.
I'm sorry I've been absent. I'm trying to change that.
I took the wrong approach. I'm sorry.
You deserved more from me in that moment.
I'm sorry I made things harder.
I know I can't undo it. But I'm sorry.
I'm sorry for the times I wasn't present.
I'm still learning. I'm sorry for the mistakes.
I'm sorry. And I love you. Both are true.
